### Example 1: This operation creates or updates a policy set definition in the given subscription with the given name. (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> Set-AzPolicySetDefinition -Description Updated policy to not allow virtual machine creation -DisplayName {DisplayName} -Name VMPolicySetDefinition -PolicyDefinition {PolicyDefinition} -SubscriptionId (Get-AzContext).Subscription.Id
```
